snippet.title: Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
We are proud to reveal a new party action game set in the Umamusume universe, Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash, releasing worldwide in 2024!

Tracen academy's time-honored Spring Fan Fest will play host to a very special event this time—the Slapdash Grand Prix. Pick a team from a pixelated roster of fan-favorite Umamusume, and conquer all four events to take home the trophy!

Visit our official website and Twitter account for the latest updates!

Official Website - Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash (English)
https://hachamecha-umamusume.jp/en

Official Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash Twitter (Japanese and English)
https://twitter.com/uma_musu_hacha

Platform: Nintendo Switch™, PlayStation®4, and Steam®
Genre: Party Action
Players: 1-4 (Local or Online)
Release Date: Coming in 2024
Rating: Pending
